module.p:
eun beag a little bird –
Chunnaic mi eun beag ann an craoibh agus iolair air creig.
I saw a little bird in a tree and an eagle on a rock. td. 236

eun ann an craoibh a bird in a tree –
Dh’ fhàg Màiri agus Seumas an taigh tràth anns a’ mhadainn. Bha an latha blàth, agus bha na h-eòin a’ seinn anns na craobhan.
Mary and James left the house early in the morning. The day was warm, and the birds were singing in the trees. td. 76 [adapted]

seinn eun a bird sings –
Dh’ fhàg Màiri agus Seumas an taigh tràth anns a’ mhadainn. Bha an latha blàth, agus bha na h-eòin a’ seinn anns na craobhan.
Mary and James left the house early in the morning. The day was warm, and the birds were singing in the trees. td. 76 [adapted]
